FuncDef: The display flowspec ipv6 statistics command displays statistics about traffic matching the filtering rule in a BGP IPv6 Flow Specification route.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the route of a specified index.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display flowspec ipv6 statistics command displays statistics about traffic matching the filtering rule in a BGP IPv6 Flow Specification route.
